title: Drawing, Design for Writing Table, 1900–05
medium: Pen and black ink, black crayon on thin cream paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, bottom left: Table / 4ft-6in long; in black crayon, below that: wax[?]
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Two-tier writing table with rounded back, raised on 4 tapering, fluted legs; cut-out center bottom flanked by 4 drawers of varying sizes stacked vertically on either side; blotter and inkwell top center; upper section has 8 drawers of varying sizes with stack of books upper right and vases (one with flowers) and an ornate clock upper left.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Writing Table, 1900–05. Pen and black ink, black crayon on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-247
